{{Infobox USB Hub |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Desktop Hub |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Belkin |model = F4U017 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 05/10/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Belkin_F4U017 |sernum = |series = |usb_ver = 2.0 |conn = Female Mini-B |size_class = desktop |vendor_id = 050d |device_id = 0017 |vendor_id2 = |device_id2 = |fcc_id = |controller_num = |chip1 = Terminus Technology;FE2.1; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |pwr_optional = true |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.8 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |ports = 7 |tt = multi |power_led = none |port_led = |flags = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |availability = |eoldate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 722868718896 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = N82E16817394104 |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "F4U017 REV:1.2/ 1.0mm" is silkscreened on the board of the unit populating this entry. :There is no S/N on the casing. The power adapter included with the hub appears to be an ''unbranded'' PS0538 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz 0.6A -> 5VDC 3.5-3.8A). {{SCollapse | lsusb -v dump â€¢ >> |
